org.openimaj.ml.clustering.kmeans

Class HierarchicalFloatKMeansResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.ml.clustering.kmeans.HierarchicalFloatKMeansResult
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Readable, ReadableASCII, ReadableBinary, ReadWriteable, Writeable, WriteableASCII, WriteableBinary, Clusters, SpatialClusters<float[]>

    public class HierarchicalFloatKMeansResult
extends Object
implements SpatialClusters<float[]>
    The result of a HierarchicalFloatKMeans clustering operation.
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk), Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
